messages.message: Invalid bytesPlanes in basic DFD block. BytesPlanes must be 0 for supercompressed textures.
messages.details: DFD block #1 bytesPlanes in basic DFD block are 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 but for BasisLZ/ETC1S supercompressed textures these must be zeros.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
